actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production, Marketing, and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to make loans available to farmers for commodity storage facilities.
short_title: Farm Storage Facility Loan Act of 1982

summary.text: Farm Storage Facility Loan Act of 1982 - Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to make onfarm storage facility loans to producers of wheat, corn, oats, barley, dry edible beans, soybeans, and high moisture forage silage under the following conditions; (1) a $40,000,000 maximum total annual principal indebtedness; (2) a $50,000) (currently, $25,000) loan limit per producer; (3) a maximum 20 percent (currently, 30 percent) farmer equity allowance; (4) eligibility for three-year capacity facilities; and (5) an eight-year (currently, five-year) repayment period.

titles.title: Farm Storage Facility Loan Act of 1982
A bill to make loans available to farmers for commodity storage facilities.
